author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: The ESP32-P4 Smart 86 Box is a compact development board with a 4-inch capacitive touchscreen, designed for HMI, smart control panels, and edge processing. Its 86 mm form factor allows it to be easily installed in wall-mounted enclosures for use in embedded automation and smart terminal applications. As the name implies, this board is built […]
title: Touchscreen Smart Box Based on ESP32-P4 with Wi-Fi 6 or Ethernet
